mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, a.rsv_num, a.user_id, a.place_num, a.review_guest_wr, a.review_guest_rate, a.help_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(a.review_guest_regd, '%Y. %m. %d') as review_guest_regd, (select user_nick_name from member where user_id = a.user_id) as user_nick_name from reviewGuest a, (select @rownum:=0) temp where place_num = #{placeNum} order by review_guest_regd ) b where b.no > #{rowNum} limit 5;

choose.when: UPDATE reviewGuest as a, (select help_cnt from reviewGuest where rsv_num=#{rsvNum} and user_id=#{userId}) as b SET a.help_cnt = b.help_cnt-1 where rsv_num=#{rsvNum} and user_id=#{userId};
UPDATE reviewGuest as a, (select help_cnt from reviewGuest where rsv_num=#{rsvNum} and user_id=#{userId}) as b SET a.help_cnt = b.help_cnt+1 where rsv_num=#{rsvNum} and user_id=#{userId};

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM clicked_review WHERE rsv_num=#{rsvNum} and clicked_user_id=#{clickedUserId}
